name: Golley Slater
description:
The Golley Slater Group is a network of UK offices, helping clients overcome marketing challenges of all shapes and sizes. From changing behaviour to growing brands or boosting sales, our team make a real difference to local, national and international clients.Headquartered in Cardiff with offices across the UK, we deliver creative advertising, direct and digital, PR, media, branding, social media, and recruitment campaigns for our range of clients.
We employ over 200 experienced people in our offices in Cardiff, London, Leeds and Cirencester.
